name: SlackSMS
description: A library to interface between Slack and Twilio

SLACK_BOT_NAME.description: Name of the bot as it should appear in Slack

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URI.description: A webhook URI to send http POST requests

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: Issued by Slack to authenticate requests

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Used by Twilio to identify apps as a username

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Issued by Twilio to authenticate requests

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: Your Twilio number configured for SMS
